Existing LLM-based systems excel at surface-level text analysis but lack the guarantees required for principled jurisprudence. We introduce L4M, a novel framework that combines adversarial LLM agents with SMT-solver-backed proofs to unite the interpretive flexibility of natural language with the rigor of symbolic verification. The pipeline consists of three phases: (1) Statute Formalization, where domain-specific prompts convert legal provisions into logical formulae; (2) Dual Fact and Statute Extraction, in which prosecutor- and defense-aligned LLMs independently map case narratives to fact tuples and statutes, ensuring role isolation; and (3) Solver-Centric Adjudication, where an autoformalizer compiles both parties' arguments into logic constraints, and unsat cores trigger iterative self-critique until a satisfiable formula is achieved, which is then verbalized by a Judge-LLM into a transparent verdict and optimized sentence. Experimental results on public benchmarks show that our system surpasses advanced LLMs including GPT-o4-mini, DeepSeek-V3, and Claude 4 as well as state-of-the-art Legal AI baselines, while providing rigorous and explainable symbolic justifications.

AI.tldr: L4M是一个结合对抗性LLM智能体和SMT求解器支持证明的新框架，旨在将自然语言的解释灵活性与符号验证的严谨性结合起来，实现更严谨和可解释的法律推理，并在公共基准测试中超越了现有先进的LLM和法律AI基线。
AI.motivation: 现有基于LLM的系统在表面文本分析方面表现出色，但缺乏进行原则性法理学所需的保证。法律的理性体现在实质理性和形式理性两个方面，而LLM在形式理性方面存在不足，无法提供严格的逻辑一致性。因此，需要一个能够结合自然语言解释灵活性和符号验证严谨性的框架。
AI.method: L4M框架包含三个阶段：1) 法规形式化，使用特定领域提示将法律条文转换为逻辑公式；2) 双重事实与法规提取，由检察官和辩护方LLM独立地将案例叙述映射到事实元组和法规，确保角色隔离；3) 以求解器为中心的裁决，自动形式化器将双方论点编译为逻辑约束，SMT求解器通过不可满足核心触发迭代自我批评，直到达到可满足公式，然后由法官LLM将其口头化为透明判决和优化判决。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，L4M系统在公共基准测试中超越了包括GPT-o4-mini、DeepSeek-V3和Claude 4在内的先进LLM以及最先进的法律AI基线，同时提供了严谨且可解释的符号论证。
AI.conclusion: L4M成功地将自然语言的解释灵活性与符号验证的严谨性结合起来，为法律决策提供了卓越的性能和可解释性，有效解决了现有LLM在法律推理中缺乏保证的问题。

title: Length-MAX Tokenizer for Language Models
summary: We introduce a new tokenizer for language models that minimizes the average tokens per character, thereby reducing the number of tokens needed to represent text during training and to generate text during inference. Our method, which we refer to as the Length-MAX tokenizer, obtains its vocabulary by casting a length-weighted objective maximization as a graph partitioning problem and developing a greedy approximation algorithm. On FineWeb and diverse domains, it yields 14--18\% fewer tokens than Byte Pair Encoding (BPE) across vocabulary sizes from 10K to 50K, and the reduction is 13.0\% when the size is 64K. Training GPT-2 models at 124M, 355M, and 1.3B parameters from scratch with five runs each shows 18.5\%, 17.2\%, and 18.5\% fewer steps, respectively, to reach a fixed validation loss, and 13.7\%, 12.7\%, and 13.7\% lower inference latency, together with a 16\% throughput gain at 124M, while consistently improving on downstream tasks including reducing LAMBADA perplexity by 11.7\% and enhancing HellaSwag accuracy by 4.3\%. Moreover, the Length-MAX tokenizer achieves 99.62\% vocabulary coverage and the out-of-vocabulary rate remains low at 0.12\% on test sets. These results demonstrate that optimizing for average token length, rather than frequency alone, offers an effective approach to more efficient language modeling without sacrificing -- and often improving -- downstream performance. The tokenizer is compatible with production systems and reduces embedding and KV-cache memory by 18\% at inference.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种名为Length-MAX的新型分词器，通过最小化平均字符令牌数来优化令牌化过程。它显著减少了训练和推理所需的令牌数量，从而提高了语言模型的效率，并在下游任务中表现出更好的性能。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是为了减少文本在语言模型训练和推理过程中所需的令牌数量，从而提高效率。现有分词器（如BPE）在令牌效率方面可能不是最优的，因此需要一种新的方法来最小化每个字符的平均令牌数。
AI.method: 本文引入了Length-MAX分词器，其词汇表通过将长度加权目标最大化问题转化为图划分问题来获取，并开发了一种贪婪近似算法来解决该问题。
AI.result: Length-MAX分词器在FineWeb和其他领域，与BPE相比，令牌数量减少了14-18%（词汇量为10K-50K时）和13.0%（词汇量为64K时）。在GPT-2模型上，达到固定验证损失所需的训练步数减少了17-18.5%，推理延迟降低了12.7-13.7%，吞吐量提高了16%。同时，它改进了下游任务表现，例如LAMBADA困惑度降低11.7%，HellaSwag准确率提高4.3%。此外，它实现了99.62%的词汇覆盖率和0.12%的低词外率，并在推理时将嵌入和KV缓存内存减少了18%。
AI.conclusion: 优化平均令牌长度（而不仅仅是频率）是一种有效的方法，可以提高语言模型的效率，同时不牺牲（甚至提升）下游任务的性能。Length-MAX分词器与生产系统兼容，并能有效减少内存占用。

title: Model Predictive Control and Moving Horizon Estimation using Statistically Weighted Data-Based Ensemble Models
summary: This paper presents a model predictive control (MPC) framework leveraging an ensemble of data-based models to optimally control complex systems under multiple operating conditions. A novel combination rule for ensemble models is proposed, based on the statistical Mahalanobis distance, enabling the ensemble weights to suitably vary across the prediction window based on the system input. In addition, a novel state observer for ensemble models is developed using moving horizon estimation (MHE). The effectiveness of the proposed methodology is demonstrated on a benchmark energy system operating under multiple conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于集成数据模型的模型预测控制（MPC）框架，通过马哈拉诺比斯距离组合规则和移动视界估计（MHE）状态观测器，实现复杂系统在多工况下的优化控制。
AI.motivation: 在多工况下对复杂系统进行最优控制是一个挑战，需要能够适应不同操作条件的模型。本文旨在通过利用数据驱动的集成模型来解决这一问题。
AI.method: 该研究采用以下方法：1. 提出一个模型预测控制（MPC）框架，该框架利用集成数据模型来控制复杂系统。2. 提出一种基于统计马哈拉诺比斯距离的新型集成模型组合规则，使集成权重能够根据系统输入在预测窗口内适当地变化。3. 开发了一种使用移动视界估计（MHE）的集成模型状态观测器。
AI.result: 所提出的方法在一个基准能源系统上进行了验证，该系统在多种操作条件下运行，并展示了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功开发并验证了一个结合集成数据模型、基于马哈拉诺比斯距离的动态权重组合规则以及MHE状态观测器的MPC框架，能够有效控制在多工况下运行的复杂系统。

title: Neural NMPC through Signed Distance Field Encoding for Collision Avoidance
summary: This paper introduces a neural Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC) framework for mapless, collision-free navigation in unknown environments with Aerial Robots, using onboard range sensing. We leverage deep neural networks to encode a single range image, capturing all the available information about the environment, into a Signed Distance Function (SDF). The proposed neural architecture consists of two cascaded networks: a convolutional encoder that compresses the input image into a low-dimensional latent vector, and a Multi-Layer Perceptron that approximates the corresponding spatial SDF. This latter network parametrizes an explicit position constraint used for collision avoidance, which is embedded in a velocity-tracking NMPC that outputs thrust and attitude commands to the robot. First, a theoretical analysis of the contributed NMPC is conducted, verifying recursive feasibility and stability properties under fixed observations. Subsequently, we evaluate the open-loop performance of the learning-based components as well as the closed-loop performance of the controller in simulations and experiments. The simulation study includes an ablation study, comparisons with two state-of-the-art local navigation methods, and an assessment of the resilience to drifting odometry. The real-world experiments are conducted in forest environments, demonstrating that the neural NMPC effectively performs collision avoidance in cluttered settings against an adversarial reference velocity input and drifting position estimates.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于神经网络的非线性模型预测控制（NMPC）框架，用于无人机在未知环境中进行无图、无碰撞导航，利用机载测距传感器将测距图像编码为符号距离函数（SDF）以实现避障。
AI.motivation: 在未知环境中，利用机载测距传感器实现无人机的无图、无碰撞导航是一个挑战。
AI.method: 该方法引入了一个神经NMPC框架。核心是利用深度神经网络将单帧测距图像编码成符号距离函数（SDF）。其神经网络架构包括一个卷积编码器（将图像压缩为低维潜在向量）和一个多层感知器（将潜在向量近似为空间SDF）。SDF被用作显式位置约束以避免碰撞，并嵌入到速度跟踪NMPC中，输出推力和姿态指令。研究还进行了NMPC的理论分析，验证了在固定观测下的递归可行性和稳定性。通过仿真（包括消融研究、与现有方法的比较以及对里程计漂移的评估）和真实世界实验（在森林环境中）来评估学习组件的开环性能和控制器的闭环性能。
AI.result: 理论分析验证了所提出的NMPC的递归可行性和稳定性。仿真研究表明，该方法在碰撞避免方面表现出色，优于两种最先进的局部导航方法，并对里程计漂移具有鲁棒性。真实世界实验在森林环境中进行，证明了该神经NMPC在杂乱环境中能有效执行碰撞避免，即使面对对抗性参考速度输入和漂移的位置估计。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的神经NMPC框架能够使无人机在未知、杂乱的环境中有效实现无图、无碰撞导航，并表现出对里程计漂移和对抗性输入的鲁棒性。

title: Improvement of Collision Avoidance in Cut-In Maneuvers Using Time-to-Collision Metrics
summary: This paper proposes a new strategy for collision avoidance system leveraging Time-to-Collision (TTC) metrics for handling cut-in scenarios, which are particularly challenging for autonomous vehicles (AVs). By integrating a deep learning with TTC calculations, the system predicts potential collisions and determines appropriate evasive actions compared to traditional TTC -based approaches.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合深度学习和碰撞时间（TTC）指标的新型防撞策略，专门用于处理自动驾驶车辆面临的切入场景。
AI.motivation: 切入场景对自动驾驶车辆（AVs）来说极具挑战性，且传统基于TTC的方法存在局限性。
AI.method: 该系统通过整合深度学习与TTC计算，预测潜在碰撞并确定适当的规避动作。
AI.result: 与传统基于TTC的方法相比，该系统能够更有效地预测潜在碰撞并采取规避行动。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出了一种通过结合深度学习和TTC来改进自动驾驶车辆在切入场景下防撞能力的新策略。

title: OVOD-Agent: A Markov-Bandit Framework for Proactive Visual Reasoning and Self-Evolving Detection
summary: Open-Vocabulary Object Detection (OVOD) aims to enable detectors to generalize across categories by leveraging semantic information. Although existing methods are pretrained on large vision-language datasets, their inference is still limited to fixed category names, creating a gap between multimodal training and unimodal inference. Previous work has shown that improving textual representation can significantly enhance OVOD performance, indicating that the textual space is still underexplored. To this end, we propose OVOD-Agent, which transforms passive category matching into proactive visual reasoning and self-evolving detection. Inspired by the Chain-of-Thought (CoT) paradigm, OVOD-Agent extends the textual optimization process into an interpretable Visual-CoT with explicit actions. OVOD's lightweight nature makes LLM-based management unsuitable; instead, we model visual context transitions as a Weakly Markovian Decision Process (w-MDP) over eight state spaces, which naturally represents the agent's state, memory, and interaction dynamics. A Bandit module generates exploration signals under limited supervision, helping the agent focus on uncertain regions and adapt its detection policy. We further integrate Markov transition matrices with Bandit trajectories for self-supervised Reward Model (RM) optimization, forming a closed loop from Bandit exploration to RM learning. Experiments on COCO and LVIS show that OVOD-Agent provides consistent improvements across OVOD backbones, particularly on rare categories, confirming the effectiveness of the proposed framework.

AI.tldr: OVOD-Agent通过引入可解释的Visual-CoT和基于弱马尔可夫决策过程(w-MDP)的视觉推理，将开放词汇目标检测(OVOD)从被动匹配转变为主动推理和自进化检测，显著提升了稀有类别的检测性能。
AI.motivation: 现有OVOD方法在多模态训练和单模态推理之间存在差距，推理受限于固定的类别名称，且文本空间尚未充分探索，导致检测性能受限。研究表明，改进文本表示能显著提升OVOD性能。
AI.method: 本文提出了OVOD-Agent，将文本优化扩展为具有明确动作的可解释Visual-CoT。它将视觉上下文转换建模为八个状态空间上的弱马尔可夫决策过程(w-MDP)。一个Bandit模块在有限监督下生成探索信号，帮助Agent关注不确定区域。此外，马尔可夫转移矩阵与Bandit轨迹相结合，用于自监督奖励模型(RM)优化，形成一个闭环。
AI.result: 在COCO和LVIS数据集上的实验表明，OVOD-Agent在不同的OVOD骨干网络上都提供了持续的性能提升，尤其是在稀有类别上表现突出。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的OVOD-Agent框架通过主动的视觉推理和自进化检测，有效弥补了多模态训练与单模态推理之间的差距，显著提升了开放词汇目标检测的性能，尤其对稀有类别检测效果显著。

title: Evo-Memory: Benchmarking LLM Agent Test-time Learning with Self-Evolving Memory
summary: Statefulness is essential for large language model (LLM) agents to perform long-term planning and problem-solving. This makes memory a critical component, yet its management and evolution remain largely underexplored. Existing evaluations mostly focus on static conversational settings, where memory is passively retrieved from dialogue to answer queries, overlooking the dynamic ability to accumulate and reuse experience across evolving task streams. In real-world environments such as interactive problem assistants or embodied agents, LLMs are required to handle continuous task streams, yet often fail to learn from accumulated interactions, losing valuable contextual insights, a limitation that calls for test-time evolution, where LLMs retrieve, integrate, and update memory continuously during deployment. To bridge this gap, we introduce Evo-Memory, a comprehensive streaming benchmark and framework for evaluating self-evolving memory in LLM agents. Evo-Memory structures datasets into sequential task streams, requiring LLMs to search, adapt, and evolve memory after each interaction. We unify and implement over ten representative memory modules and evaluate them across 10 diverse multi-turn goal-oriented and single-turn reasoning and QA datasets. To better benchmark experience reuse, we provide a baseline method, ExpRAG, for retrieving and utilizing prior experience, and further propose ReMem, an action-think-memory refine pipeline that tightly integrates reasoning, task actions, and memory updates to achieve continual improvement.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了Evo-Memory，一个用于评估大型语言模型（LLM）代理自进化记忆的基准和框架，以解决其在连续任务流中积累和重用经验的能力不足的问题，并提出了ReMem管道以实现持续改进。
AI.motivation: LLM代理在长期规划和问题解决中需要状态性，使记忆成为关键组成部分，但其管理和演化尚未得到充分探索。现有评估多集中于静态对话，忽略了在动态任务流中积累和重用经验的能力。LLMs常无法从累积交互中学习，失去宝贵的上下文洞察，这促使研究在部署过程中持续检索、整合和更新记忆。
AI.method: 本文引入了Evo-Memory，一个综合的流式基准和框架，用于评估LLM代理的自进化记忆。Evo-Memory将数据集构建为顺序任务流，要求LLM在每次交互后搜索、适应和进化记忆。作者统一并实现了十多种代表性记忆模块，并在10个多样的多轮目标导向和单轮推理及问答数据集中进行了评估。为更好地基准化经验重用，提供了ExpRAG作为基线方法，并提出了ReMem，一个紧密整合推理、任务行动和记忆更新的“行动-思考-记忆精炼”管道，以实现持续改进。
AI.result: 本文的主要成果是创建了Evo-Memory基准和框架，它能够全面评估LLM代理在连续任务流中自进化记忆的能力。同时，提出了ExpRAG基线方法和ReMem管道，后者通过整合推理、行动和记忆更新，旨在实现LLM代理在动态环境中的持续学习和改进。
AI.conclusion: Evo-Memory基准和ReMem管道共同弥补了当前LLM代理记忆管理和演化评估的空白，为在连续、动态任务环境中实现LLM代理的自进化记忆和持续改进提供了全面的评估工具和有效的方法。

title: Training-Free Diffusion Priors for Text-to-Image Generation via Optimization-based Visual Inversion
summary: Diffusion models have established the state-of-the-art in text-to-image generation, but their performance often relies on a diffusion prior network to translate text embeddings into the visual manifold for easier decoding. These priors are computationally expensive and require extensive training on massive datasets. In this work, we challenge the necessity of a trained prior at all by employing Optimization-based Visual Inversion (OVI), a training-free and data-free alternative, to replace the need for a prior. OVI initializes a latent visual representation from random pseudo-tokens and iteratively optimizes it to maximize the cosine similarity with input textual prompt embedding. We further propose two novel constraints, a Mahalanobis-based and a Nearest-Neighbor loss, to regularize the OVI optimization process toward the distribution of realistic images. Our experiments, conducted on Kandinsky 2.2, show that OVI can serve as an alternative to traditional priors. More importantly, our analysis reveals a critical flaw in current evaluation benchmarks like T2I-CompBench++, where simply using the text embedding as a prior achieves surprisingly high scores, despite lower perceptual quality. Our constrained OVI methods improve visual fidelity over this baseline, with the Nearest-Neighbor approach proving particularly effective, achieving quantitative scores comparable to or higher than the state-of-the-art data-efficient prior, indicating that the idea merits further investigation. The code will be publicly available upon acceptance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种名为OVI的免训练、免数据方法来替代扩散模型中计算昂贵的先验网络，并发现现有评估基准存在缺陷。
AI.motivation: 扩散模型中的先验网络在计算上开销巨大，且需要大量数据进行训练。本文旨在寻找一种无需训练的替代方案。
AI.method: 引入基于优化的视觉反演（OVI）方法，该方法从随机伪标记初始化潜在视觉表示，并通过迭代优化使其与输入文本提示嵌入的余弦相似度最大化。此外，提出了两种新的约束：基于马哈拉诺比斯距离和最近邻损失，以将OVI优化过程正则化到真实图像的分布。
AI.result: 实验表明，OVI可以作为传统先验的替代方案。更重要的是，分析揭示了T2I-CompBench++等当前评估基准的一个关键缺陷：仅使用文本嵌入作为先验就能获得惊人的高分，尽管感知质量较低。本文提出的受约束OVI方法（尤其是最近邻方法）在此基线上提高了视觉保真度，并取得了与最先进的数据高效先验相当或更高的量化分数。
AI.conclusion: OVI作为扩散模型中训练先验的替代方案具有可行性，且值得进一步研究。同时，当前文本到图像生成模型的评估基准存在需要解决的缺陷。

title: Evaluation of Large Language Models for Numeric Anomaly Detection in Power Systems
summary: Large language models (LLMs) have gained increasing attention in power grids for their general-purpose capabilities. Meanwhile, anomaly detection (AD) remains critical for grid resilience, requiring accurate and interpretable decisions based on multivariate telemetry. Yet the performance of LLMs on large-scale numeric data for AD remains largely unexplored. This paper presents a comprehensive evaluation of LLMs for numeric AD in power systems. We use GPT-OSS-20B as a representative model and evaluate it on the IEEE 14-bus system. A standardized prompt framework is applied across zero-shot, few-shot, in-context learning, low rank adaptation (LoRA), fine-tuning, and a hybrid LLM-traditional approach. We adopt a rule-aware design based on the three-sigma criterion, and report detection performance and rationale quality. This study lays the groundwork for further investigation into the limitations and capabilities of LLM-based AD and its integration with classical detectors in cyber-physical power grid applications.

AI.tldr: 本文全面评估了大型语言模型（LLMs）在电力系统数字异常检测（AD）中的性能，使用GPT-OSS-20B在IEEE 14节点系统上，通过多种提示和微调方法，并结合三西格玛准则进行检测和推理质量分析。
AI.motivation: 尽管LLMs在通用能力方面备受关注，且异常检测对电网弹性至关重要，但LLMs在处理大规模数字数据进行电力系统异常检测方面的性能尚未得到充分探索。
AI.method: 研究采用GPT-OSS-20B模型，并在IEEE 14节点系统上进行评估。应用标准化提示框架，涵盖零样本、少样本、上下文学习、低秩适应（LoRA）、微调以及LLM与传统方法的混合方法。采用基于三西格玛准则的规则感知设计，并报告检测性能和推理质量。
AI.result: 本文对LLMs在电力系统数字异常检测中的应用进行了全面评估，并报告了不同方法下的检测性能和推理质量。
AI.conclusion: 这项研究为进一步探索基于LLM的异常检测的局限性、能力及其与经典检测器在信息物理电力系统应用中的集成奠定了基础。

title: Hybrid Control for Robotic Nut Tightening Task
summary: An autonomous robotic nut tightening system for a serial manipulator equipped with a parallel gripper is proposed. The system features a hierarchical motion-primitive-based planner and a control-switching scheme that alternates between force and position control. Extensive simulations demonstrate the system's robustness to variance in initial conditions. Additionally, the proposed controller tightens threaded screws 14% faster than the baseline while applying 40 times less contact force on manipulands. For the benefit of the research community, the system's implementation is open-sourced.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种用于串联机械臂和并联夹持器的自主机器人螺母拧紧系统，该系统结合了分层运动基元规划器和力-位置控制切换方案，实现了更快的拧紧速度和更小的接触力。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是开发一种自主机器人系统，能够高效且精确地执行螺母拧紧任务，以提高自动化装配的性能和鲁棒性。
AI.method: 该系统采用分层运动基元规划器来规划机器人运动，并结合了在力控制和位置控制之间切换的控制方案。通过广泛的仿真来验证系统性能。
AI.result: 仿真结果表明，该系统对初始条件的变化具有鲁棒性。与基线相比，所提出的控制器拧紧螺纹螺钉的速度快14%，同时施加在操作物上的接触力减少40倍。系统实现已开源。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的自主机器人螺母拧紧系统在速度、接触力和鲁棒性方面表现出色，为自动化装配任务提供了高效且精确的解决方案。

title: Winning with Less for Low Resource Languages: Advantage of Cross-Lingual English_Persian Argument Mining Model over LLM Augmentation
summary: Argument mining is a subfield of natural language processing to identify and extract the argument components, like premises and conclusions, within a text and to recognize the relations between them. It reveals the logical structure of texts to be used in tasks like knowledge extraction. This paper aims at utilizing a cross-lingual approach to argument mining for low-resource languages, by constructing three training scenarios. We examine the models on English, as a high-resource language, and Persian, as a low-resource language. To this end, we evaluate the models based on the English Microtext corpus \citep{PeldszusStede2015}, and its parallel Persian translation. The learning scenarios are as follow: (i) zero-shot transfer, where the model is trained solely with the English data, (ii) English-only training enhanced by synthetic examples generated by Large Language Models (LLMs), and (iii) a cross-lingual model that combines the original English data with manually translated Persian sentences. The zero-shot transfer model attains F1 scores of 50.2\% on the English test set and 50.7\% on the Persian test set. LLM-based augmentation model improves the performance up to 59.2\% on English and 69.3\% on Persian. The cross-lingual model, trained on both languages but evaluated solely on the Persian test set, surpasses the LLM-based variant, by achieving a F1 of 74.8\%. Results indicate that a lightweight cross-lingual blend can outperform considerably the more resource-intensive augmentation pipelines, and it offers a practical pathway for the argument mining task to overcome data resource shortage on low-resource languages.

AI.tldr: 该研究旨在通过构建三种训练场景，利用跨语言方法解决低资源语言的论证挖掘问题，并发现轻量级跨语言混合模型表现优于资源密集型数据增强方法。
AI.motivation: 论证挖掘是自然语言处理中的一个重要子领域，能揭示文本的逻辑结构，但低资源语言在此任务上面临数据匮乏的挑战。
AI.method: 研究在英语（高资源语言）和波斯语（低资源语言）上进行模型评估，使用英语Microtext语料库及其波斯语并行翻译。构建了三种学习场景：(i) 零样本迁移（仅用英语数据训练），(ii) 英语训练结合大型语言模型（LLMs）生成的合成示例进行增强，以及(iii) 结合原始英语数据和手动翻译的波斯语句子的跨语言模型。
AI.result: 零样本迁移模型在英语测试集上F1分数为50.2%，在波斯语测试集上为50.7%。基于LLM的数据增强模型将英语性能提升至59.2%，波斯语提升至69.3%。跨语言模型（在两种语言上训练，仅在波斯语测试集上评估）达到了74.8%的F1分数，超越了基于LLM的变体。
AI.conclusion: 结果表明，轻量级的跨语言混合方法可以显著优于更资源密集的数据增强流程，为低资源语言的论证挖掘任务克服数据资源短缺提供了一条实用的途径。

title: Causality Without Causal Models
summary: Perhaps the most prominent current definition of (actual) causality is due to Halpern and Pearl.  It is defined using causal models (also known as structural equations models).  We abstract the definition, extracting its key features, so that it can be applied to any other model where counterfactuals are defined. By abstracting the definition, we gain a number of benefits. Not only can we apply the definition in a wider range of models, including ones that allow, for example, backtracking, but we can apply the definition to determine if A is a cause of B  even if A and B are formulas involving disjunctions, negations, beliefs, and nested counterfactuals (none of which can be handled by the Halpern-Pearl definition). Moreover, we can extend the ideas to getting an abstract definition of explanation that can be applied beyond causal models. Finally, we gain a deeper understanding of features of the definition  even in causal models.

AI.tldr: 本文抽象了Halpern-Pearl的因果关系定义，使其能应用于更广泛的模型和更复杂的公式，并深化了对其特征的理解。
AI.motivation: Halpern-Pearl的因果关系定义虽然突出，但存在局限性，例如只能用于因果模型，且无法处理涉及析取、否定、信念和嵌套反事实的复杂公式。研究者希望扩展其适用范围。
AI.method: 通过提取Halpern-Pearl因果关系定义中的关键特征，对其进行抽象化处理，使其可以应用于任何定义了反事实的模型。
AI.result: 抽象后的定义不仅可以应用于更广泛的模型（包括允许回溯的模型），还能处理包含析取、否定、信念和嵌套反事实的复杂公式。此外，该方法可以扩展为解释的抽象定义，并加深了对因果关系定义特征的理解。
AI.conclusion: 通过抽象化Halpern-Pearl的因果关系定义，显著扩展了其适用范围，使其能够处理更复杂的因果判断和解释，并提供了对该定义更深层次的理解。

title: SPHINX: A Synthetic Environment for Visual Perception and Reasoning
summary: We present Sphinx, a synthetic environment for visual perception and reasoning that targets core cognitive primitives. Sphinx procedurally generates puzzles using motifs, tiles, charts, icons, and geometric primitives, each paired with verifiable ground-truth solutions, enabling both precise evaluation and large-scale dataset construction. The benchmark covers 25 task types spanning symmetry detection, geometric transformations, spatial reasoning, chart interpretation, and sequence prediction. Evaluating recent large vision-language models (LVLMs) shows that even state-of-the-art GPT-5 attains only 51.1% accuracy, well below human performance. Finally, we demonstrate that reinforcement learning with verifiable rewards (RLVR) substantially improves model accuracy on these tasks and yields gains on external visual reasoning benchmarks, highlighting its promise for advancing multimodal reasoning.

AI.tldr: Sphinx是一个合成环境，用于评估和提升视觉感知与推理能力，通过程序化生成带可验证解的谜题。基准测试显示，即使是SOTA的LVLMs（如GPT-5）也远低于人类水平。研究表明，带有可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）能显著提高模型在此类任务上的准确性，并对外部视觉推理基准产生积极影响。
AI.motivation: 旨在评估和提升模型在视觉感知与推理中的核心认知原语能力，并提供一个能生成带可验证真值解的谜题环境，以实现精确评估和大规模数据集构建。
AI.method: 提出了Sphinx合成环境，通过程序化方法生成包含多种元素（图案、瓷砖、图表、图标、几何原语）的谜题，并为每个谜题提供可验证的真值解。该环境涵盖25种任务类型。研究评估了最新的大型视觉-语言模型（LVLMs）在此基准上的表现，并探索了带有可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）方法。
AI.result: 评估结果显示，即使是最先进的LVLMs（如GPT-5）在此基准测试中也仅达到51.1%的准确率，远低于人类表现。此外，研究发现，带有可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）能够显著提高模型在这些任务上的准确性，并对外部视觉推理基准也带来了性能提升。
AI.conclusion: 本研究强调了带有可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）在推动多模态推理方面具有巨大潜力。

title: RefTr: Recurrent Refinement of Confluent Trajectories for 3D Vascular Tree Centerline Graphs
summary: Tubular trees, such as blood vessels and lung airways, are essential for material transport within the human body. Accurately detecting their centerlines with correct tree topology is critical for clinical tasks such as diagnosis, treatment planning, and surgical navigation. In these applications, maintaining high recall is crucial, as missing small branches can result in fatal mistakes caused by incomplete assessments or undetected abnormalities. We present RefTr, a 3D image-to-graph model for centerline generation of vascular trees via recurrent refinement of confluent trajectories. RefTr uses a Producer-Refiner architecture based on a Transformer decoder, where the Producer proposes a set of initial confluent trajectories that are recurrently refined by the Refiner to produce final trajectories, which forms the centerline graph. The confluent trajectory representation enables refinement of complete trajectories while explicitly enforcing a valid tree topology. The recurrent refinement scheme improves precision and reuses the same Refiner block across multiple steps, yielding a 2.4x reduction in decoder parameters compared to previous SOTA. We also introduce an efficient non-maximum suppression algorithm for spatial tree graphs to merge duplicate branches and boost precision. Across multiple public centerline datasets, RefTr achieves superior recall and comparable precision to previous SOTA, while offering faster inference and substantially fewer parameters, demonstrating its potential as a new state-of-the-art framework for vascular tree analysis in 3D medical imaging.

AI.tldr: 本文提出RefTr，一种用于血管树中心线生成的3D图像到图模型，通过递归细化合流轨迹，实现高召回率、更快的推理速度和显著减少的参数量，在多个公开数据集上表现优异。
AI.motivation: 准确检测人体内管状树（如血管和肺气道）的中心线及其正确的树状拓扑结构对临床诊断、治疗计划和手术导航至关重要。特别是在这些应用中，保持高召回率至关重要，因为遗漏小分支可能导致评估不完整或异常未被发现，从而造成致命错误。
AI.method: RefTr是一个基于Transformer解码器的Producer-Refiner架构的3D图像到图模型。Producer生成一组初始的合流轨迹，Refiner通过递归细化这些轨迹以产生最终的中心线图。合流轨迹表示允许细化完整轨迹并明确强制执行有效的树状拓扑。递归细化方案提高了精度，并跨多个步骤重用相同的Refiner块，从而使解码器参数比现有SOTA减少2.4倍。此外，还引入了一种高效的空间树图非最大抑制算法来合并重复分支并提高精度。
AI.result: 在多个公开中心线数据集上，RefTr实现了优于现有SOTA的召回率和可比的精度，同时提供了更快的推理速度和显著减少的参数量。与现有SOTA相比，解码器参数减少了2.4倍。
AI.conclusion: RefTr作为一种新的3D医学影像中血管树分析的SOTA框架，展示了其潜力，具有高召回率、效率更高和参数更少的优点。

title: Emergence and Localisation of Semantic Role Circuits in LLMs
summary: Despite displaying semantic competence, large language models' internal mechanisms that ground abstract semantic structure remain insufficiently characterised. We propose a method integrating role-cross minimal pairs, temporal emergence analysis, and cross-model comparison to study how LLMs implement semantic roles. Our analysis uncovers: (i) highly concentrated circuits (89-94% attribution within 28 nodes); (ii) gradual structural refinement rather than phase transitions, with larger models sometimes bypassing localised circuits; and (iii) moderate cross-scale conservation (24-59% component overlap) alongside high spectral similarity. These findings suggest that LLMs form compact, causally isolated mechanisms for abstract semantic structure, and these mechanisms exhibit partial transfer across scales and architectures.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过结合最小对、时间演化分析和跨模型比较，揭示了大型语言模型（LLMs）实现抽象语义角色的内部机制，发现这些机制紧凑、因果独立，并能在不同尺度和架构间部分迁移。
AI.motivation: 尽管大型语言模型展现出语义能力，但其内部机制如何扎根抽象语义结构仍未得到充分描述。
AI.method: 本研究提出了一种集成方法，包括角色交叉最小对（role-cross minimal pairs）、时间涌现分析（temporal emergence analysis）和跨模型比较（cross-model comparison），以研究LLMs如何实现语义角色。
AI.result: 分析揭示了：(i) 高度集中的电路（89-94%的归因集中在28个节点内）；(ii) 结构逐渐细化而非相变，较大的模型有时会绕过局部电路；以及 (iii) 中等的跨尺度保守性（24-59%的组件重叠）和高度的光谱相似性。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现表明，LLMs为抽象语义结构形成了紧凑、因果独立的机制，并且这些机制在不同尺度和架构之间表现出部分迁移性。

title: $\mathcal{E}_0$: Enhancing Generalization and Fine-Grained Control in VLA Models via Continuized Discrete Diffusion
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models offer a unified framework for robotic manipulation by integrating visual perception, language understanding, and control generation. Yet existing VLA models still struggle to generalize across diverse tasks, scenes, and camera viewpoints, and often produce coarse or unstable actions. We introduce E0, a continuized discrete diffusion framework that formulates action generation as iterative denoising over quantized action tokens. Compared with continuous diffusion policies, E0 offers two key advantages: (1) discrete action tokens align naturally with the symbolic structure of pretrained VLM/VLA backbones, enabling stronger semantic conditioning; and 2. discrete diffusion matches the true quantized nature of real-world robot control-whose hardware constraints (e.g., encoder resolution, control frequency, actuation latency) inherently discretize continuous signals-and therefore benefits from a Bayes-optimal denoiser that models the correct discrete action distribution, leading to stronger generalization. Compared with discrete autoregressive and mask-based discrete diffusion models, E0 supports a significantly larger and finer-grained action vocabulary and avoids the distributional mismatch introduced by masking-based corruptions-yielding more accurate fine-grained action control. We further introduce a spherical viewpoint perturbation augmentation method to improve robustness to camera shifts without additional data. Experiments on LIBERO, VLABench, and ManiSkill show that E0 achieves state-of-the-art performance across 14 diverse environments, outperforming strong baselines by 10.7% on average. Real-world evaluation on a Franka arm confirms that E0 delivers precise, robust, and transferable manipulation, establishing discrete diffusion as a promising direction for generalizable VLA policy learning.

AI.tldr: E0是一种连续化的离散扩散框架，通过量化动作令牌的迭代去噪，解决了现有VLA模型在泛化性、精细控制和稳定性方面的不足，实现了机器人操作的SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在跨任务、场景和摄像机视角的泛化能力方面表现不佳，并且经常产生粗糙或不稳定的动作。
AI.method: 本文提出了E0，一个连续化的离散扩散框架，将动作生成表述为对量化动作令牌的迭代去噪。E0的优势在于：1) 离散动作令牌与预训练VLM/VLA骨干的符号结构自然对齐，实现更强的语义条件作用；2) 离散扩散与真实世界机器人控制的量化特性相匹配，通过贝叶斯最优去噪器建模正确的离散动作分布，从而增强泛化能力。与离散自回归和基于掩码的离散扩散模型相比，E0支持更大、更细粒度的动作词汇，并避免了掩码引入的分布不匹配。此外，引入了球形视角扰动增强方法以提高对相机位移的鲁棒性。
AI.result: E0在LIBERO、VLABench和ManiSkill上的14个多样化环境中实现了最先进的性能，平均超越强基线10.7%。在Franka机械臂上的真实世界评估证实，E0提供了精确、鲁棒和可迁移的操作。
AI.conclusion: 离散扩散（E0）被确立为可泛化VLA策略学习的一个有前景的方向，能够实现精确、鲁棒和可迁移的机器人操作。

title: Influence of converter current limiting and prioritization on protection of highly IBR-penetrated networks
summary: This paper investigates how grid-forming (GFM) and grid-following (GFL) control strategies in inverter-based resources (IBRs) influence line distance and differential protection in converter-dominated transmission systems. A modified IEEE 39-bus system is evaluated with GFM and GFL units equipped with low-voltage ride-through logic, current limiting, and positive- or negative-sequence prioritization. Distance protection is implemented with a mho characteristic, while line differential protection uses an alpha-plane approach. Results show that phase-to-ground loops in distance protection can substantially overestimate the fault location near the Zone-1 reach. For line differential protection, external faults may cause the operating point to briefly enter the trip region of the alpha-plane, even for the healthy-phase in ABG faults under GFL control and during the initial moments of the fault, demanding strong external security measures. These findings highlight that modern converter controls, together with current limitation and sequence-current prioritization, can compromise the reliability and security of traditional protection schemes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了逆变器型资源(IBRs)中的并网型(GFM)和随网型(GFL)控制策略如何影响以换流器为主的输电系统中的线路距离和差动保护，发现它们会损害传统保护方案的可靠性和安全性。
AI.motivation: 在以换流器为主的输电系统中，逆变器型资源(IBRs)的并网型(GFM)和随网型(GFL)控制策略，以及电流限制和序电流优先级，可能会影响甚至损害传统的输电线路保护方案（如距离和差动保护）的性能和可靠性。
AI.method: 研究评估了一个修改后的IEEE 39节点系统。系统中配备了具有低电压穿越逻辑、电流限制和正/负序优先级的GFM和GFL单元。距离保护采用Mho特性实现，而线路差动保护则使用alpha-plane方法。
AI.result: 研究结果显示，距离保护中的相地故障回路会严重高估故障位置，尤其是在接近第一区范围时。对于线路差动保护，外部故障可能导致操作点短暂进入alpha-plane的跳闸区域，即使是在GFL控制下的ABG故障的健康相以及故障发生初期，这需要强大的外部安全措施。这些发现强调了现代换流器控制、电流限制和序电流优先级会损害传统保护方案的可靠性和安全性。
AI.conclusion: 现代换流器控制策略，结合电流限制和序电流优先级，对传统距离和差动保护方案的可靠性和安全性构成了挑战。这些因素可能导致故障定位不准确和外部故障误跳，凸显了在换流器主导的电网中重新评估和调整保护方案的必要性。

title: Model-Based Policy Adaptation for Closed-Loop End-to-End Autonomous Driving
summary: End-to-end (E2E) autonomous driving models have demonstrated strong performance in open-loop evaluations but often suffer from cascading errors and poor generalization in closed-loop settings. To address this gap, we propose Model-based Policy Adaptation (MPA), a general framework that enhances the robustness and safety of pretrained E2E driving agents during deployment. MPA first generates diverse counterfactual trajectories using a geometry-consistent simulation engine, exposing the agent to scenarios beyond the original dataset. Based on this generated data, MPA trains a diffusion-based policy adapter to refine the base policy's predictions and a multi-step Q value model to evaluate long-term outcomes. At inference time, the adapter proposes multiple trajectory candidates, and the Q value model selects the one with the highest expected utility. Experiments on the nuScenes benchmark using a photorealistic closed-loop simulator demonstrate that MPA significantly improves performance across in-domain, out-of-domain, and safety-critical scenarios. We further investigate how the scale of counterfactual data and inference-time guidance strategies affect overall effectiveness.

AI.tldr: 端到端（E2E）自动驾驶模型在闭环环境中表现不佳，本文提出模型基策略适应（MPA）框架，通过生成反事实轨迹、训练扩散策略适配器和多步Q值模型，显著提升了预训练E2E驾驶代理的鲁棒性和安全性。
AI.motivation: 端到端（E2E）自动驾驶模型在开环评估中表现良好，但在闭环设置中常因级联错误和泛化能力差而受挫，缺乏鲁棒性和安全性。
AI.method: MPA框架首先使用几何一致的模拟引擎生成多样化的反事实轨迹。然后，基于这些数据训练一个基于扩散的策略适配器来细化基础策略预测，并训练一个多步Q值模型来评估长期结果。在推理时，适配器提出多个轨迹候选，Q值模型选择预期效用最高的轨迹。
AI.result: 在nuScenes基准上使用逼真的闭环模拟器进行的实验表明，MPA在域内、域外和安全关键场景中显著提高了性能。研究还探讨了反事实数据的规模和推理时引导策略对整体有效性的影响。
AI.conclusion: MPA通过生成反事实数据和模型基策略适应，成功解决了E2E自动驾驶模型在闭环部署中面临的鲁棒性和安全性挑战，显著提升了代理的表现。

title: TrackList: Tracing Back Query Linguistic Diversity for Head and Tail Knowledge in Open Large Language Models
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) have proven efficient in giving definition-type answers to user input queries. While for humans giving various types of answers, such as examples and paraphrases, is an easy task, LLMs struggle to provide correct answers for other than definition-type queries. In this study, we evaluated this drop in performance using TrackList, a fine-grained linguistic and statistical analysis pipeline to investigate the impact of the pre-training data on LLMs answers to diverse linguistic queries. We also introduce RefoMed-EN, an English dataset consisting of 6170 human-annotated medical terms alongside their corresponding definitions, denominations, exemplifications, explanations, or paraphrases. We studied whether the high frequency of a concept (head) or low frequency (tail) impacts the language model's performance. We evaluated the quality of the LLM's output using syntactic and semantic similarity metrics, statistical correlations and embeddings. Results showed that the LLM's task performance for definition type questions is the highest, while for the exemplification type it is the lowest. Additionally, we showed that for definition-type questions, large language models are prone to paraphrase more on popular and frequent knowledge and less on tail and technical knowledge, especially in the expert texts.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了大型语言模型（LLMs）在处理除定义型查询之外的其他语言查询时的性能下降问题，发现其在定义型问题上表现最佳，在例证型问题上表现最差，并受概念频率影响。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型在提供定义型答案方面表现高效，但与人类不同，它们在提供示例、释义等其他类型答案时表现不佳，研究旨在探究这种性能下降的原因和程度。
AI.method: 研究采用TrackList管道进行细粒度的语言和统计分析，以调查预训练数据对LLMs回答多样化语言查询的影响。同时引入了RefoMed-EN数据集（包含6170个医学术语及其定义、称谓、例证、解释或释义）。研究评估了概念频率（高频或低频）对模型性能的影响，并使用句法和语义相似性指标、统计相关性及嵌入来评估LLM输出质量。
AI.result: 结果显示，LLM在定义型问题上的任务表现最高，而在例证型问题上最低。此外，对于定义型问题，大型语言模型更倾向于对流行和高频知识进行释义，而对尾部和技术性知识（尤其是在专家文本中）的释义较少。
AI.conclusion: 大型语言模型在处理不同类型的语言查询时性能存在显著差异，尤其在例证方面表现不足。其对知识的释义倾向也受概念频率影响，对流行知识的释义多于专业或长尾知识，这揭示了LLMs在复杂知识理解和生成方面的局限性。

title: VacuumVLA: Boosting VLA Capabilities via a Unified Suction and Gripping Tool for Complex Robotic Manipulation
summary: Vision Language Action models have significantly advanced general purpose robotic manipulation by harnessing large scale pretrained vision and language representations. Among existing approaches, a majority of current VLA systems employ parallel two finger grippers as their default end effectors. However, such grippers face inherent limitations in handling certain real world tasks such as wiping glass surfaces or opening drawers without handles due to insufficient contact area or lack of adhesion. To overcome these challenges, we present a low cost, integrated hardware design that combines a mechanical two finger gripper with a vacuum suction unit, enabling dual mode manipulation within a single end effector. Our system supports flexible switching or synergistic use of both modalities, expanding the range of feasible tasks. We validate the efficiency and practicality of our design within two state of the art VLA frameworks: DexVLA and Pi0. Experimental results demonstrate that with the proposed hybrid end effector, robots can successfully perform multiple complex tasks that are infeasible for conventional two finger grippers alone. All hardware designs and controlling systems will be released.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种低成本、集成化的双模末端执行器，结合了机械两指夹持器和真空吸盘，以克服传统两指夹持器在视觉语言动作（VLA）机器人操作中的局限性，从而扩展了机器人可执行的任务范围。
AI.motivation: 现有的大多数VLA系统主要使用并联两指夹持器，但在处理某些实际任务（如擦拭玻璃表面或打开无把手抽屉）时，由于接触面积不足或缺乏附着力而面临固有限制。
AI.method: 研究人员设计了一种低成本、集成化的硬件，将机械两指夹持器与真空吸盘单元结合在一个末端执行器中，实现了双模操作。该系统支持灵活切换或协同使用两种模式。该设计在DexVLA和Pi0两个先进的VLA框架中进行了效率和实用性验证。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，通过提出的混合末端执行器，机器人可以成功执行多种传统两指夹持器单独无法完成的复杂任务。
AI.conclusion: 该混合末端执行器设计有效克服了传统两指夹持器的局限性，显著扩展了VLA系统可执行任务的范围，并展现了其效率和实用性。所有硬件设计和控制系统都将发布。

title: New Hybrid Heuristics for Pseudo-Boolean Propagation
summary: In pseudo-boolean solving the currently most successful unit propagation strategy is a hybrid mode combining the watched literal scheme with the counting method. This short paper introduces new heuristics for this hybrid decision, which are able to drastically outperform the current method in the RoundingSAT solver.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于伪布尔求解中混合单元传播的新启发式方法，该方法在RoundingSAT求解器中显著优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 伪布尔求解中当前最成功的单元传播策略是结合了监视字面量方案和计数方法的混合模式。研究旨在改进这种混合决策的性能。
AI.method: 引入了针对混合决策（结合监视字面量和计数方法）的新启发式方法。
AI.result: 这些新启发式方法在RoundingSAT求解器中能够显著超越现有方法。
AI.conclusion: 新的启发式方法为伪布尔求解中的混合单元传播策略带来了显著的性能提升。

title: Decentralized Shepherding of Non-Cohesive Swarms Through Cluttered Environments via Deep Reinforcement Learning
summary: This paper investigates decentralized shepherding in cluttered environments, where a limited number of herders must guide a larger group of non-cohesive, diffusive targets toward a goal region in the presence of static obstacles. A hierarchical control architecture is proposed, integrating a high-level target assignment rule, where each herder is paired with a selected target, with a learning-based low-level driving module that enables effective steering of the assigned target. The low-level policy is trained in a one-herder-one-target scenario with a rectangular obstacle using Proximal Policy Optimization and then directly extended to multi-agent settings with multiple obstacles without requiring retraining. Numerical simulations demonstrate smooth, collision-free trajectories and consistent convergence to the goal region, highlighting the potential of reinforcement learning for scalable, model-free shepherding in complex environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种分层控制架构，结合高层目标分配和基于学习的低层驱动模块，用于在复杂环境中实现有限牧羊人对大量非合作目标的去中心化引导。
AI.motivation: 在存在静态障碍物的杂乱环境中，有限数量的牧羊人需要引导大量非内聚、扩散性目标群体到达目标区域。
AI.method: 采用分层控制架构：高层使用目标分配规则（牧羊人与选定目标配对），低层使用基于学习的驱动模块（有效引导分配的目标）。低层策略在单个牧羊人-单个目标场景下，利用近端策略优化（PPO）进行训练，并直接扩展到多智能体、多障碍物环境而无需重新训练。
AI.result: 数值模拟显示出平滑、无碰撞的轨迹，并能持续收敛到目标区域，验证了强化学习在复杂环境中实现可扩展、无模型引导的潜力。
AI.conclusion: 强化学习在复杂环境中实现可扩展、无模型的引导任务中具有巨大潜力。

title: Prune4Web: DOM Tree Pruning Programming for Web Agent
summary: Web automation employs intelligent agents to execute high-level tasks by mimicking human interactions with web interfaces. Despite the capabilities of recent Large Language Model (LLM)-based web agents, navigating complex, real-world webpages efficiently remains a significant hurdle due to the prohibitively large size of Document Object Model (DOM) structures, often ranging from 10,000 to 100,000 tokens. Existing strategies typically rely on crude DOM truncation -- risking the loss of critical information -- or employ inefficient heuristics and separate ranking models, failing to achieve an optimal balance between precision and scalability. To address these challenges, we introduce Prune4Web, a novel paradigm that shifts DOM processing from resource-intensive LLM reading to efficient programmatic pruning. Central to our approach is DOM Tree Pruning Programming, where an LLM generates executable Python scoring scripts to dynamically filter DOM elements based on semantic cues from decomposed sub-tasks. This mechanism eliminates the need for LLMs to ingest raw, massive DOMs, instead delegating traversal and scoring to lightweight, interpretable programs. This methodology achieves a 25x to 50x reduction in candidate elements for grounding, thereby facilitating precise action localization while mitigating attention dilution. Furthermore, we propose a specialized data annotation pipeline and a two-turn dialogue training strategy that jointly optimizes the Planner, Programmatic Filter, and Grounder within a unified framework. Extensive experiments demonstrate state-of-the-art performance. Notably, on our low-level grounding task, Prune4Web dramatically improves accuracy from 46.8% to 88.28%, underscoring its efficacy in real-world web automation.

AI.tldr: Prune4Web提出了一种新颖范式，通过LLM生成的Python脚本进行高效的程序化DOM剪枝，显著减少了网页自动化中LLM处理DOM的负担，提高了动作定位的精度和效率。
AI.motivation: 当前的LLM驱动的网页代理在处理复杂、真实的网页时面临挑战，因为DOM结构过于庞大（10,000至100,000个token），导致效率低下。现有方法（如粗略截断或低效启发式）要么丢失关键信息，要么无法在精度和可扩展性之间取得平衡。
AI.method: 引入了Prune4Web范式，将DOM处理从资源密集型LLM阅读转变为高效的程序化剪枝。核心是DOM树剪枝编程，LLM生成可执行的Python评分脚本，根据分解子任务的语义线索动态过滤DOM元素。这消除了LLM直接摄取大规模原始DOM的需求。此外，提出了一种专门的数据标注流程和两轮对话训练策略，以统一优化规划器、程序化过滤器和定位器。
AI.result: 该方法实现了25倍到50倍的候选元素减少，从而促进了精确的动作定位并减轻了注意力稀释。在低级定位任务上，Prune4Web将准确率从46.8%大幅提高到88.28%，并展示了最先进的性能。
AI.conclusion: Prune4Web通过其程序化DOM剪枝方法，有效解决了大规模DOM结构对LLM驱动网页代理的挑战，显著提升了真实世界网页自动化的效率和精度。

title: Unsupervised Memorability Modeling from Tip-of-the-Tongue Retrieval Queries
summary: Visual content memorability has intrigued the scientific community for decades, with applications ranging widely, from understanding nuanced aspects of human memory to enhancing content design. A significant challenge in progressing the field lies in the expensive process of collecting memorability annotations from humans. This limits the diversity and scalability of datasets for modeling visual content memorability. Most existing datasets are limited to collecting aggregate memorability scores for visual content, not capturing the nuanced memorability signals present in natural, open-ended recall descriptions. In this work, we introduce the first large-scale unsupervised dataset designed explicitly for modeling visual memorability signals, containing over 82,000 videos, accompanied by descriptive recall data. We leverage tip-of-the-tongue (ToT) retrieval queries from online platforms such as Reddit. We demonstrate that our unsupervised dataset provides rich signals for two memorability-related tasks: recall generation and ToT retrieval. Large vision-language models fine-tuned on our dataset outperform state-of-the-art models such as GPT-4o in generating open-ended memorability descriptions for visual content. We also employ a contrastive training strategy to create the first model capable of performing multimodal ToT retrieval. Our dataset and models present a novel direction, facilitating progress in visual content memorability research.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了首个大规模无监督数据集，用于建模视觉内容记忆性，包含82,000多个视频及描述性回忆数据。通过利用Reddit等在线平台的“话在嘴边”查询，该数据集在回忆生成和“话在嘴边”检索任务中展现了丰富的信号，微调后的模型在生成开放式记忆描述方面超越了GPT-4o等现有技术，并首次实现了多模态“话在嘴边”检索。
AI.motivation: 视觉内容记忆性研究面临的主要挑战是人工收集记忆性标注成本高昂，这限制了数据集的多样性和可扩展性。现有数据集主要收集聚合记忆性分数，未能捕捉自然、开放式回忆描述中细致的记忆信号。
AI.method: 研究者引入了一个大型无监督数据集，包含超过82,000个视频及其描述性回忆数据。他们利用Reddit等在线平台上的“话在嘴边”（ToT）检索查询来构建数据。该数据集用于评估两个记忆性相关任务：回忆生成和ToT检索。大型视觉-语言模型在该数据集上进行微调，并采用对比训练策略来创建首个能够执行多模态ToT检索的模型。
AI.result: 该无监督数据集为回忆生成和ToT检索任务提供了丰富的信号。在数据集上微调的大型视觉-语言模型在为视觉内容生成开放式记忆描述方面，表现优于GPT-4o等现有最先进模型。研究还创建了首个能够执行多模态ToT检索的模型。
AI.conclusion: 该数据集和模型为视觉内容记忆性研究提供了新的方向，促进了该领域的进展。

title: Chatty-KG: A Multi-Agent AI System for On-Demand Conversational Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs
comment: This paper is accepted to SIGMOD 2026
summary: Conversational Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGs) combines the factual grounding of KG-based QA with the interactive nature of dialogue systems. KGs are widely used in enterprise and domain applications to provide structured, evolving, and reliable knowledge. Large language models (LLMs) enable natural and context-aware conversations, but lack direct access to private and dynamic KGs. Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems can retrieve graph content but often serialize structure, struggle with multi-turn context, and require heavy indexing. Traditional KGQA systems preserve structure but typically support only single-turn QA, incur high latency, and struggle with coreference and context tracking. To address these limitations, we propose Chatty-KG, a modular multi-agent system for conversational QA over KGs. Chatty-KG combines RAG-style retrieval with structured execution by generating SPARQL queries through task-specialized LLM agents. These agents collaborate for contextual interpretation, dialogue tracking, entity and relation linking, and efficient query planning, enabling accurate and low-latency translation of natural questions into executable queries. Experiments on large and diverse KGs show that Chatty-KG significantly outperforms state-of-the-art baselines in both single-turn and multi-turn settings, achieving higher F1 and P@1 scores. Its modular design preserves dialogue coherence and supports evolving KGs without fine-tuning or pre-processing. Evaluations with commercial (e.g., GPT-4o, Gemini-2.0) and open-weight (e.g., Phi-4, Gemma 3) LLMs confirm broad compatibility and stable performance. Overall, Chatty-KG unifies conversational flexibility with structured KG grounding, offering a scalable and extensible approach for reliable multi-turn KGQA.

AI.tldr: Chatty-KG是一个模块化多智能体系统，用于知识图谱上的对话式问答。它结合了检索增强生成（RAG）和结构化执行，通过任务专用的大语言模型（LLM）智能体生成SPARQL查询，显著优于现有基线。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在知识图谱（KG）上的对话式问答面临挑战：大型语言模型（LLM）无法直接访问私有和动态KG；检索增强生成（RAG）系统难以处理KG结构和多轮对话；传统KGQA系统通常只支持单轮问答、延迟高且难以处理指代和上下文跟踪。
AI.method: Chatty-KG是一个模块化的多智能体系统。它通过任务专用的LLM智能体生成SPARQL查询，结合了RAG风格的检索和结构化执行。这些智能体协同工作，进行上下文解释、对话跟踪、实体和关系链接以及高效的查询规划，将自然语言问题准确、低延迟地转化为可执行查询。
AI.result: 在大型多样化的KG上的实验表明，Chatty-KG在单轮和多轮设置中均显著优于现有基线，实现了更高的F1和P@1分数。其模块化设计保持了对话连贯性，并支持演进中的KG，无需微调或预处理。它与商业和开源LLM（如GPT-4o、Gemini-2.0、Phi-4、Gemma 3）具有广泛兼容性和稳定性能。
AI.conclusion: Chatty-KG将对话灵活性与结构化KG基础相结合，为可靠的多轮KGQA提供了一种可扩展和可扩展的方法。

title: Understanding Regional Inertia Dynamics in CAISO from Real Grid Disturbances
comment: This work has been accepted for publication in IEEE PES T&D 2026. The final published version will be available via IEEE Xplore
summary: The shift from synchronous generators to inverter-based resources has caused power system inertia to be unevenly distributed across power grids. As a result, certain grid regions are more vulnerable to high rate-of-change of frequency (RoCoF) during disturbances. This paper presents a measurement-based framework for estimating grid inertia in CAISO (California Independent System Operator) region using real disturbance-driven frequency data from the Frequency Monitoring Network (FNET/GridEye). By analyzing confirmed disturbances from 2013 to 2024, we identify trends in regional inertia and frequency dynamics, highlighting their relationship with renewable generation and the evolving duck curve. Regional RoCoF values were up to six times higher than interconnection-wide values, coinciding with declining inertia. Recent recovery in inertia is attributed to the increased deployment of battery energy storage systems with synthetic inertia capabilities. These findings underscore the importance of regional inertia monitoring, strategic resource planning, and adaptive operational practices to ensure grid reliability amid growing renewable integration.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个基于测量的框架，利用实际扰动数据估算CAISO区域电网惯量，发现区域RoCoF值显著高于互联系统，并指出电池储能系统对近期惯量恢复的贡献。
AI.motivation: 同步发电机向逆变器基资源转变导致电网惯量分布不均，部分区域在扰动期间面临高频率变化率（RoCoF）的脆弱性，因此需要监测和理解区域惯量动态以确保电网可靠性。
AI.method: 采用基于测量的框架，利用频率监测网络（FNET/GridEye）中实际扰动驱动的频率数据，分析了2013年至2024年CAISO区域的已确认扰动，以估算电网惯量并识别区域惯量和频率动态的趋势。
AI.result: 研究发现，区域RoCoF值最高可达互联系统范围值的六倍，这与惯量下降同时发生。近期惯量的恢复归因于部署了具有合成惯量能力的电池储能系统。同时，研究还揭示了区域惯量和频率动态与可再生能源发电以及不断演变的鸭子曲线之间的关系。
AI.conclusion: 研究强调了区域惯量监测、战略性资源规划和适应性运行实践的重要性，以确保在可再生能源日益整合的背景下电网的可靠性。

title: Estimating Fog Parameters from a Sequence of Stereo Images
summary: We propose a method which, given a sequence of stereo foggy images, estimates the parameters of a fog model and updates them dynamically. In contrast with previous approaches, which estimate the parameters sequentially and thus are prone to error propagation, our algorithm estimates all the parameters simultaneously by solving a novel optimisation problem. By assuming that fog is only locally homogeneous, our method effectively handles real-world fog, which is often globally inhomogeneous. The proposed algorithm can be easily used as an add-on module in existing visual Simultaneous Localisation and Mapping (SLAM) or odometry systems in the presence of fog. In order to assess our method, we also created a new dataset, the Stereo Driving In Real Fog (SDIRF), consisting of high-quality, consecutive stereo frames of real, foggy road scenes under a variety of visibility conditions, totalling over 40 minutes and 34k frames. As a first-of-its-kind, SDIRF contains the camera's photometric parameters calibrated in a lab environment, which is a prerequisite for correctly applying the atmospheric scattering model to foggy images. The dataset also includes the counterpart clear data of the same routes recorded in overcast weather, which is useful for companion work in image defogging and depth reconstruction. We conducted extensive experiments using both synthetic foggy data and real foggy sequences from SDIRF to demonstrate the superiority of the proposed algorithm over prior methods. Our method not only produces the most accurate estimates on synthetic data, but also adapts better to real fog. We make our code and SDIRF publicly available\footnote{https://github.com/SenseRoboticsLab/estimating-fog-parameters} to the community with the aim of advancing the research on visual perception in fog.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种从立体雾图像序列中动态估计雾模型参数的方法，通过解决一个新颖的优化问题同时估计所有参数，有效处理局部均匀但全局不均匀的真实雾。同时，作者创建并发布了一个高质量的真实雾立体数据集SDIRF，以促进相关研究。
AI.motivation: 现有的雾参数估计方法通常是顺序估计，容易导致误差累积。此外，真实世界的雾通常是全局不均匀的，这给现有方法带来了挑战。为了使视觉SLAM或里程计系统能在有雾环境下工作，需要一种鲁棒的雾参数估计方法。
AI.method: 该方法从立体雾图像序列中动态估计雾模型参数。与以往顺序估计不同，它通过解决一个新的优化问题同时估计所有参数，从而避免误差传播。通过假设雾在局部是均匀的，该方法能够有效处理全局不均匀的真实雾。该算法可作为现有视觉SLAM或里程计系统的附加模块。此外，作者还创建了一个新的数据集SDIRF，包含40多分钟、34k帧的真实雾立体图像序列，具有经过实验室校准的相机光度参数，并包含相同路线的清晰图像数据。
AI.result: 通过在合成雾数据和SDIRF真实雾序列上进行大量实验，结果表明所提出的算法优于现有方法。它不仅在合成数据上产生了最准确的估计，而且能更好地适应真实世界的雾。该方法的代码和SDIRF数据集已公开发布。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了一种先进的雾模型参数动态估计方法，能够鲁棒地处理真实世界中复杂多变的雾条件。同时发布的SDIRF数据集，特别是其独特的相机光度参数校准和清晰数据对照，将极大地推动雾中视觉感知领域的研究进展。

title: Conversational no-code and multi-agentic disease module identification and drug repurposing prediction with ChatDRex
summary: Repurposing approved drugs offers a time-efficient and cost-effective alternative to traditional drug development. However, in silico prediction of repurposing candidates is challenging and requires the effective collaboration of specialists in various fields, including pharmacology, medicine, biology, and bioinformatics. Fragmented, specialized algorithms and tools often address only narrow aspects of the overall problem, and heterogeneous, unstructured data landscapes require specialized users to be involved. Hence, these data services do not integrate smoothly across workflows. With ChatDRex, we present a conversation-based, multi-agent system that facilitates the execution of complex bioinformatic analyses aiming for network-based drug repurposing prediction. It builds on the integrated systems medicine knowledge graph NeDRex. ChatDRex provides natural language access to its extensive biomedical KG and integrates bioinformatics agents for network analysis and drug repurposing, complemented by agents for functional coherence evaluation for in silico validation, as well as agents for literature mining and for discussing the obtained results in a scientific context. Its flexible multi-agent design assigns specific tasks to specialized agents, including query routing, data retrieval, algorithm execution, and result visualization. A dedicated reasoning module keeps the user in the loop and allows for hallucination detection. By enabling physicians and researchers without computer science expertise to control complex analyses in natural language, ChatDRex democratizes access to bioinformatics as an important resource for drug repurposing. It enables clinical experts to generate hypotheses and explore drug repurposing opportunities, ultimately accelerating the discovery of novel therapies and advancing personalized medicine and translational research.

AI.tldr: ChatDRex是一个基于对话的多智能体系统，旨在通过自然语言促进网络化药物再利用预测的复杂生物信息学分析，使非计算机科学专家也能访问生物信息学资源。
AI.motivation: 传统药物开发耗时且成本高昂。药物再利用具有潜力，但在硅预测面临挑战：现有工具和数据分散且需要专业知识，导致非计算机科学专家难以进行复杂的生物信息学分析。
AI.method: ChatDRex是一个基于集成系统医学知识图谱NeDRex的对话式多智能体系统。它提供对生物医学知识图谱的自然语言访问，并集成了用于网络分析、药物再利用、功能一致性评估、文献挖掘和科学讨论的生物信息学智能体。其灵活的多智能体设计将特定任务分配给专业智能体，并包含一个推理模块以保持用户参与并检测幻觉。
AI.result: ChatDRex使没有计算机科学专业知识的医生和研究人员能够用自然语言控制复杂的分析，从而民主化了生物信息学在药物再利用中的应用。它赋能临床专家生成假设并探索药物再利用机会。
AI.conclusion: ChatDRex通过使生物信息学分析更易于访问，加速了新疗法的发现，推动了精准医疗和转化研究的发展。

title: VibraWave: Sensing the Pulse of Polluted Waters
summary: Conventional methods for water pollutant detection, such as chemical assays and optical spectroscopy, are often invasive, expensive, and unsuitable for real-time, portable monitoring. In this paper, we introduce VibraWave, a novel non-invasive sensing framework that combines mmWave radar with controlled acoustic excitation, tensor decomposition, and deep learning to detect and quantify a wide range of water pollutants. By capturing radar reflections as a three-dimensional tensor encoding phase dynamics, range bin power, and angle-of-arrival (AoA), we apply PARAFAC decomposition with non-negative constraints to extract compact, interpretable pollutant fingerprints. These are used to train a lightweight student neural network via knowledge distillation, enabling joint classification and quantification of heavy metals (Cu, Fe, Mg), oil emulsions, and sediments. Extensive experiments show that VibraWave achieves high accuracy and low RMSE across pure, binary, and tertiary mixtures, while remaining robust and computationally efficient, making it well-suited for scalable, real-time water quality monitoring.

AI.tldr: 本文提出VibraWave，一种结合毫米波雷达、声学激励、张量分解和深度学习的非侵入式水污染物检测框架，可实现多种水污染物的实时分类和定量。
AI.motivation: 传统水污染物检测方法通常具有侵入性、成本高昂，且不适用于实时、便携式监测。
AI.method: VibraWave利用毫米波雷达结合受控声学激励，捕获雷达反射并编码为包含相位动态、距离单元功率和到达角（AoA）的三维张量。通过应用带非负约束的PARAFAC分解提取紧凑且可解释的污染物指纹。随后，使用知识蒸馏训练一个轻量级学生神经网络，以实现重金属（铜、铁、镁）、油乳液和沉积物的联合分类和定量。
AI.result: VibraWave在纯净、二元和三元混合物中均实现了高精度和低均方根误差（RMSE），同时保持了鲁棒性和计算效率。
AI.conclusion: VibraWave非常适用于可扩展的实时水质监测，为解决传统方法的局限性提供了有效方案。

title: V$^{2}$-SAM: Marrying SAM2 with Multi-Prompt Experts for Cross-View Object Correspondence
summary: Cross-view object correspondence, exemplified by the representative task of ego-exo object correspondence, aims to establish consistent associations of the same object across different viewpoints (e.g., ego-centric and exo-centric). This task poses significant challenges due to drastic viewpoint and appearance variations, making existing segmentation models, such as SAM2, non-trivial to apply directly. To address this, we present V^2-SAM, a unified cross-view object correspondence framework that adapts SAM2 from single-view segmentation to cross-view correspondence through two complementary prompt generators. Specifically, the Cross-View Anchor Prompt Generator (V^2-Anchor), built upon DINOv3 features, establishes geometry-aware correspondences and, for the first time, unlocks coordinate-based prompting for SAM2 in cross-view scenarios, while the Cross-View Visual Prompt Generator (V^2-Visual) enhances appearance-guided cues via a novel visual prompt matcher that aligns ego-exo representations from both feature and structural perspectives. To effectively exploit the strengths of both prompts, we further adopt a multi-expert design and introduce a Post-hoc Cyclic Consistency Selector (PCCS) that adaptively selects the most reliable expert based on cyclic consistency. Extensive experiments validate the effectiveness of V^2-SAM, achieving new state-of-the-art performance on Ego-Exo4D (ego-exo object correspondence), DAVIS-2017 (video object tracking), and HANDAL-X (robotic-ready cross-view correspondence).

AI.tldr: V^2-SAM是一个统一的跨视角物体对应框架，它通过引入几何感知锚点提示和外观引导视觉提示，将SAM2从单视角分割扩展到跨视角对应，并在多个基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 跨视角物体对应（如自我-外部视角物体对应）面临视角和外观剧烈变化的挑战，使得现有的单视角分割模型（如SAM2）难以直接应用。
AI.method: 本文提出了V^2-SAM框架，通过两个互补的提示生成器将SAM2从单视角分割适应到跨视角对应：1) 跨视角锚点提示生成器（V^2-Anchor）基于DINOv3特征建立几何感知对应，并首次为SAM2在跨视角场景中解锁了基于坐标的提示；2) 跨视角视觉提示生成器（V^2-Visual）通过新颖的视觉提示匹配器，从特征和结构角度对自我-外部视角表示进行对齐，增强了外观引导线索。为有效利用这两种提示的优势，模型还采用了多专家设计，并引入了后验循环一致性选择器（PCCS），根据循环一致性自适应选择最可靠的专家。
AI.result: V^2-SAM在Ego-Exo4D（自我-外部视角物体对应）、DAVIS-2017（视频物体跟踪）和HANDAL-X（机器人就绪的跨视角对应）等数据集上均取得了新的最先进（SOTA）性能。
AI.conclusion: V^2-SAM通过创新的几何感知和外观引导提示机制，成功解决了跨视角物体对应的挑战，并有效利用SAM2的能力，在多项任务中展现了卓越的性能和泛化能力。

title: Test-Time Alignment of Text-to-Image Diffusion Models via Null-Text Embedding Optimisation
summary: Test-time alignment (TTA) aims to adapt models to specific rewards during inference. However, existing methods tend to either under-optimise or over-optimise (reward hack) the target reward function. We propose Null-Text Test-Time Alignment (Null-TTA), which aligns diffusion models by optimising the unconditional embedding in classifier-free guidance, rather than manipulating latent or noise variables. Due to the structured semantic nature of the text embedding space, this ensures alignment occurs on a semantically coherent manifold and prevents reward hacking (exploiting non-semantic noise patterns to improve the reward). Since the unconditional embedding in classifier-free guidance serves as the anchor for the model's generative distribution, Null-TTA directly steers model's generative distribution towards the target reward rather than just adjusting the samples, even without updating model parameters. Thanks to these desirable properties, we show that Null-TTA achieves state-of-the-art target test-time alignment while maintaining strong cross-reward generalisation. This establishes semantic-space optimisation as an effective and principled novel paradigm for TTA.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Null-TTA，一种通过优化无条件嵌入来对齐扩散模型的新方法，有效防止奖励作弊，实现最先进的测试时对齐和强大的跨奖励泛化。
AI.motivation: 现有的测试时对齐（TTA）方法在优化目标奖励函数时，要么欠优化，要么过优化（即奖励作弊），未能有效平衡模型对齐与泛化。
AI.method: Null-TTA通过优化分类器自由指导中的无条件嵌入来对齐扩散模型，而不是操纵潜在变量或噪声变量。这种方法利用文本嵌入空间的语义连贯性，确保对齐发生在语义一致的流形上，从而防止利用非语义噪声模式进行奖励作弊。
AI.result: Null-TTA实现了最先进的目标测试时对齐性能，同时保持了强大的跨奖励泛化能力。这表明语义空间优化是TTA的一种有效且有原则的新范式。
AI.conclusion: 语义空间优化是一种有效且有原则的新范式，可用于测试时对齐（TTA），能够实现卓越的对齐性能并避免奖励作弊，同时保持良好的泛化能力。

title: Uncertainty Quantification for Visual Object Pose Estimation
summary: Quantifying the uncertainty of an object's pose estimate is essential for robust control and planning. Although pose estimation is a well-studied robotics problem, attaching statistically rigorous uncertainty is not well understood without strict distributional assumptions. We develop distribution-free pose uncertainty bounds about a given pose estimate in the monocular setting. Our pose uncertainty only requires high probability noise bounds on pixel detections of 2D semantic keypoints on a known object. This noise model induces an implicit, non-convex set of pose uncertainty constraints. Our key contribution is SLUE (S-Lemma Uncertainty Estimation), a convex program to reduce this set to a single ellipsoidal uncertainty bound that is guaranteed to contain the true object pose with high probability. SLUE solves a relaxation of the minimum volume bounding ellipsoid problem inspired by the celebrated S-lemma. It requires no initial guess of the bound's shape or size and is guaranteed to contain the true object pose with high probability. For tighter uncertainty bounds at the same confidence, we extend SLUE to a sum-of-squares relaxation hierarchy which is guaranteed to converge to the minimum volume ellipsoidal uncertainty bound for a given set of keypoint constraints. We show this pose uncertainty bound can easily be projected to independent translation and axis-angle orientation bounds. We evaluate SLUE on two pose estimation datasets and a real-world drone tracking scenario. Compared to prior work, SLUE generates substantially smaller translation bounds and competitive orientation bounds. We release code at https://github.com/MIT-SPARK/PoseUncertaintySets.

AI.tldr: 本文提出SLUE，一种在单目设置下无需严格分布假设，通过凸优化程序为物体姿态估计提供高概率的无分布不确定性边界（椭球）。
AI.motivation: 姿态估计的不确定性量化对于鲁棒控制和规划至关重要。然而，在没有严格分布假设的情况下，附加统计上严格的不确定性仍然是一个未被充分理解的问题。
AI.method: SLUE（S-Lemma Uncertainty Estimation）利用已知物体2D语义关键点像素检测的高概率噪声边界，推导出一个隐式的、非凸的姿态不确定性约束集。它通过一个受S-引理启发的凸程序，将该集合简化为一个椭球不确定性边界，并保证以高概率包含真实物体姿态。为获得更紧密的边界，SLUE扩展到平方和松弛层次结构。该方法无需对边界形状或大小进行初始猜测，并能将姿态不确定性投影到独立的平移和轴角方向边界。
AI.result: SLUE在两个姿态估计数据集和一个真实的无人机跟踪场景中进行了评估。与现有工作相比，SLUE生成了显著更小的平移边界和具有竞争力的方向边界。
AI.conclusion: SLUE提供了一种无需分布假设，能以高概率保证包含真实姿态的、统计上严格的姿态不确定性量化方法，其生成的边界更紧密、更鲁棒。

title: EWE: An Agentic Framework for Extreme Weather Analysis
summary: Extreme weather events pose escalating risks to global society, underscoring the urgent need to unravel their underlying physical mechanisms. Yet the prevailing expert-driven, labor-intensive diagnostic paradigm has created a critical analytical bottleneck, stalling scientific progress. While AI for Earth Science has achieved notable advances in prediction, the equally essential challenge of automated diagnostic reasoning remains largely unexplored. We present the Extreme Weather Expert (EWE), the first intelligent agent framework dedicated to this task. EWE emulates expert workflows through knowledge-guided planning, closed-loop reasoning, and a domain-tailored meteorological toolkit. It autonomously produces and interprets multimodal visualizations from raw meteorological data, enabling comprehensive diagnostic analyses. To catalyze progress, we introduce the first benchmark for this emerging field, comprising a curated dataset of 103 high-impact events and a novel step-wise evaluation metric. EWE marks a step toward automated scientific discovery and offers the potential to democratize expertise and intellectual resources, particularly for developing nations vulnerable to extreme weather.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Extreme Weather Expert (EWE)，一个用于极端天气事件自动诊断推理的智能代理框架，旨在解决传统专家驱动方法的瓶颈，并引入了首个基准数据集和评估指标。
AI.motivation: 极端天气事件对全球社会构成日益增长的风险，亟需揭示其物理机制。然而，当前专家驱动、劳动密集型的诊断范式造成了分析瓶颈，阻碍了科学进步。尽管地球科学中的人工智能在预测方面取得了进展，但自动化诊断推理这一同样重要的挑战仍未被充分探索。
AI.method: 本文提出了Extreme Weather Expert (EWE) 框架，通过知识引导规划、闭环推理和领域定制的气象工具包来模拟专家工作流程。EWE能够从原始气象数据中自主生成和解释多模态可视化，以实现全面的诊断分析。为了推动该领域发展，研究还引入了首个基准测试，包括一个包含103个高影响事件的精选数据集和一个新颖的逐步评估指标。
AI.result: EWE是第一个专注于极端天气事件自动诊断推理的智能代理框架。它能够自主生成并解释多模态可视化，从而实现全面的诊断分析。此外，本文还建立了该新兴领域的首个基准，包含一个精选数据集和新的分步评估指标。
AI.conclusion: EWE标志着自动化科学发现迈出了重要一步，并有望实现专业知识和智力资源的普及化，特别是对易受极端天气影响的发展中国家具有潜在益处。

title: Semantic Anchors in In-Context Learning: Why Small LLMs Cannot Flip Their Labels
comment: 13 pages total (7 pages main text, 3 pages references, 3 pages appendix), 2 figures, 14 tables. Code available at https://github.com/AnanthaPadmanaban-KrishnaKumar/semantic-anchors-icl
summary: Can in-context learning (ICL) override pre-trained label semantics, or does it merely refine an existing semantic backbone? We address this question by treating LLMs as prompt-induced classifiers and contrasting their behavior under \emph{natural} demonstrations (with correct labels) and \emph{inverted} demonstrations (systematically flipping label meanings). We decompose ICL behavior into three alignment metrics (truth, prior, and prompt alignment) and introduce a semantic override rate, defined as correctness under flipped semantics. Across eight classification tasks and eight open-source LLMs (1--12B parameters), we find consistent evidence for a semantic anchor view. With natural demonstrations, ICL improves accuracy while maintaining strong prior alignment; most correct predictions coincide with zero-shot behavior, even when the prior is weak. With inverted demonstrations, models cannot learn coherent anti-semantic classifiers: prompt alignment increases only by sacrificing accuracy, and semantic override rates remain exactly zero in our few-shot 1--12B setting. Rather than flexibly remapping label meanings, ICL primarily adjusts how inputs project onto stable semantic directions learned during pre-training, clarifying fundamental limits of few-shot prompting and suggesting that overriding label semantics at these scales requires interventions beyond ICL. All code is available at: https://github.com/AnanthaPadmanaban-KrishnaKumar/semantic-anchors-icl.

AI.tldr: 本研究发现，上下文学习（ICL）在1-12B参数的语言模型中，主要通过调整输入到预训练语义方向的映射来优化性能，而非灵活地覆盖或重新映射预训练的标签语义。ICL表现出“语义锚定”特性，难以学习反语义分类器。
AI.motivation: 本研究旨在探究上下文学习（ICL）是能够覆盖预训练的标签语义，还是仅能细化现有的语义骨架。
AI.method: 研究将大型语言模型（LLMs）视为提示诱导的分类器，并对比其在“自然演示”（标签正确）和“反转演示”（标签含义系统性翻转）下的行为。通过分解ICL行为为三个对齐指标（真实性、先验和提示对齐），并引入“语义覆盖率”（在翻转语义下的正确性）来衡量。实验涵盖了八个分类任务和八个开源LLMs（1-12B参数）。
AI.result: 研究发现一致的证据支持“语义锚定”观点。在自然演示下，ICL提高了准确性并保持了强大的先验对齐；大多数正确预测与零样本行为一致。在反转演示下，模型无法学习连贯的反语义分类器：提示对齐的增加是以牺牲准确性为代价的，并且语义覆盖率在少量样本的1-12B模型设置中保持为零。ICL主要调整输入如何投射到预训练期间学习到的稳定语义方向上。
AI.conclusion: ICL并不能灵活地重新映射标签含义，而主要是调整输入到稳定的预训练语义方向的投射。这揭示了少样本提示的基本局限性，并表明在这些规模下，要覆盖标签语义需要超越ICL的干预措施。

title: Multi-Hypotheses Navigation in Collaborative Localization subject to Cyber Attacks
summary: This paper addresses resilient collaborative localization in multi-agent systems exposed to spoofed radio frequency measurements. Each agent maintains multiple hypotheses of its own state and exchanges selected information with neighbors using covariance intersection. Geometric reductions based on distance tests and convex hull structure limit the number of hypotheses transmitted, controlling the spread of hypotheses through the network. The method enables agents to separate spoofed and truthful measurements and to recover consistent estimates once the correct hypothesis is identified. Numerical results demonstrate the ability of the approach to contain the effect of adversarial measurements, while also highlighting the impact of conservative fusion on detection speed. The framework provides a foundation for resilient multi-agent navigation and can be extended with coordinated hypothesis selection across the network.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种多智能体系统中弹性协作定位方法，通过维护多重假设、使用协方差交集和几何削减来抵御欺骗性射频测量，从而分离真实和欺骗数据，并恢复一致的估计。
AI.motivation: 多智能体系统在面临欺骗性射频测量时，需要一种能够抵御攻击并保持准确协作定位的能力。
AI.method: 每个智能体维护自身状态的多个假设，并使用协方差交集与邻居交换选定信息。通过基于距离测试和凸包结构的几何削减，限制传输的假设数量，从而控制假设在网络中的传播。此方法使智能体能够区分欺骗性和真实测量，并在识别正确假设后恢复一致的估计。
AI.result: 数值结果表明，该方法能够有效遏制对抗性测量的影响，同时揭示了保守融合对检测速度的影响。智能体能够分离欺骗性测量和真实测量，并恢复一致的估计。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为弹性多智能体导航提供了基础，并可通过网络中协调的假设选择进行扩展。

title: TraceGen: World Modeling in 3D Trace Space Enables Learning from Cross-Embodiment Videos
summary: Learning new robot tasks on new platforms and in new scenes from only a handful of demonstrations remains challenging. While videos of other embodiments - humans and different robots - are abundant, differences in embodiment, camera, and environment hinder their direct use. We address the small-data problem by introducing a unifying, symbolic representation - a compact 3D "trace-space" of scene-level trajectories - that enables learning from cross-embodiment, cross-environment, and cross-task videos. We present TraceGen, a world model that predicts future motion in trace-space rather than pixel space, abstracting away appearance while retaining the geometric structure needed for manipulation. To train TraceGen at scale, we develop TraceForge, a data pipeline that transforms heterogeneous human and robot videos into consistent 3D traces, yielding a corpus of 123K videos and 1.8M observation-trace-language triplets. Pretraining on this corpus produces a transferable 3D motion prior that adapts efficiently: with just five target robot videos, TraceGen attains 80% success across four tasks while offering 50-600x faster inference than state-of-the-art video-based world models. In the more challenging case where only five uncalibrated human demonstration videos captured on a handheld phone are available, it still reaches 67.5% success on a real robot, highlighting TraceGen's ability to adapt across embodiments without relying on object detectors or heavy pixel-space generation.

AI.tldr: 该研究引入了TraceGen，一个使用统一的3D“轨迹空间”符号表示的世界模型，使得机器人能够从少量、跨实体、跨环境和跨任务的视频中学习新任务，并实现高效适应和高成功率。
AI.motivation: 在新的平台和场景中，机器人仅通过少量演示学习新任务仍然具有挑战性。尽管存在大量其他实体（人类和不同机器人）的视频，但由于实体、摄像机和环境的差异，这些视频无法直接使用。研究旨在解决小数据问题，并利用这些异构视频资源。
AI.method: 研究引入了一种统一的、符号化的3D“轨迹空间”表示，它是一种紧凑的场景级轨迹表示，抽象了外观但保留了几何结构。TraceGen是一个世界模型，它在轨迹空间而非像素空间预测未来运动。为大规模训练TraceGen，研究开发了TraceForge数据管道，将异构的人类和机器人视频转换为一致的3D轨迹，生成了一个包含12.3万个视频和180万个观测-轨迹-语言三元组的语料库。在此语料库上进行预训练以获得可迁移的3D运动先验。
AI.result: 通过仅五个目标机器人视频，TraceGen在四项任务中达到了80%的成功率，并且推理速度比最先进的基于视频的世界模型快50-600倍。在更具挑战性的情况下，仅有五个用手持手机拍摄的未校准人类演示视频时，它在真实机器人上仍能达到67.5%的成功率，这凸显了TraceGen在不依赖物体检测器或大量像素空间生成的情况下跨实体适应的能力。
AI.conclusion: TraceGen通过引入统一的3D轨迹空间表示和构建大规模异构数据集，成功解决了机器人学习中的小数据问题。它实现了高效的跨实体、跨环境和跨任务学习，仅需少量演示即可展现出强大的性能和更快的推理速度。

title: Context-Aware Pragmatic Metacognitive Prompting for Sarcasm Detection
summary: Detecting sarcasm remains a challenging task in the areas of Natural Language Processing (NLP) despite recent advances in neural network approaches. Currently, Pre-trained Language Models (PLMs) and Large Language Models (LLMs) are the preferred approach for sarcasm detection. However, the complexity of sarcastic text, combined with linguistic diversity and cultural variation across communities, has made the task more difficult even for PLMs and LLMs. Beyond that, those models also exhibit unreliable detection of words or tokens that require extra grounding for analysis. Building on a state-of-the-art prompting method in LLMs for sarcasm detection called Pragmatic Metacognitive Prompting (PMP), we introduce a retrieval-aware approach that incorporates retrieved contextual information for each target text. Our pipeline explores two complementary ways to provide context: adding non-parametric knowledge using web-based retrieval when the model lacks necessary background, and eliciting the model's own internal knowledge for a self-knowledge awareness strategy. We evaluated our approach with three datasets, such as Twitter Indonesia Sarcastic, SemEval-2018 Task 3, and MUStARD. Non-parametric retrieval resulted in a significant 9.87% macro-F1 improvement on Twitter Indonesia Sarcastic compared to the original PMP method. Self-knowledge retrieval improves macro-F1 by 3.29% on Semeval and by 4.08% on MUStARD. These findings highlight the importance of context in enhancing LLMs performance in sarcasm detection task, particularly the involvement of culturally specific slang, references, or unknown terms to the LLMs. Future work will focus on optimizing the retrieval of relevant contextual information and examining how retrieval quality affects performance. The experiment code is available at: https://github.com/wllchrst/sarcasm-detection_pmp_knowledge-base.

AI.tldr: 本文通过引入检索增强方法，结合网络检索的非参数知识和模型内部的自知识意识，显著提升了大型语言模型（LLMs）在讽刺检测任务上的性能，尤其是在处理文化特定内容时。
AI.motivation: 尽管预训练语言模型（PLMs）和大型语言模型（LLMs）在自然语言处理中取得了进展，但讽刺检测仍然是一个挑战。讽刺文本的复杂性、语言多样性、文化差异以及模型对需要额外背景信息的词语检测不可靠，使得这项任务对现有模型来说依然困难。
AI.method: 本文在现有的“语用元认知提示”（PMP）方法基础上，引入了一种检索增强方法，为每个目标文本提供上下文信息。该方法探索了两种互补的上下文提供方式：一是使用基于网络的检索提供非参数知识，以弥补模型背景知识的不足；二是引导模型利用其自身的内部知识，实现自知识意识策略。
AI.result: 在Twitter Indonesia Sarcastic数据集上，非参数检索方法相比原始PMP方法实现了9.87%的宏F1分数显著提升。在SemEval-2018 Task 3和MUStARD数据集上，自知识检索分别使宏F1分数提高了3.29%和4.08%。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现强调了上下文信息在增强LLM讽刺检测性能方面的重要性，特别是对于文化特定俚语、引用或LLM未知术语的处理。未来的工作将侧重于优化相关上下文信息的检索和评估检索质量对性能的影响。

title: GaINeR: Geometry-Aware Implicit Network Representation
summary: Implicit Neural Representations (INRs) have become an essential tool for modeling continuous 2D images, enabling high-fidelity reconstruction, super-resolution, and compression. Popular architectures such as SIREN, WIRE, and FINER demonstrate the potential of INR for capturing fine-grained image details. However, traditional INRs often lack explicit geometric structure and have limited capabilities for local editing or integration with physical simulation, restricting their applicability in dynamic or interactive settings. To address these limitations, we propose GaINeR: Geometry-Aware Implicit Network Representation, a novel framework for 2D images that combines trainable Gaussian distributions with a neural network-based INR. For a given image coordinate, the model retrieves the K nearest Gaussians, aggregates distance-weighted embeddings, and predicts the RGB value via a neural network. This design enables continuous image representation, interpretable geometric structure, and flexible local editing, providing a foundation for physically aware and interactive image manipulation. The official implementation of our method is publicly available at https://github.com/WJakubowska/GaINeR.

AI.tldr: 传统隐式神经表示（INR）缺乏几何结构和局部编辑能力。本文提出GaINeR，一种结合可训练高斯分布与INR的新框架，为2D图像提供几何感知、连续表示和灵活的局部编辑能力。
AI.motivation: 流行的INR架构在图像重建、超分辨率和压缩方面表现出色，但它们通常缺乏显式几何结构，且局部编辑或与物理模拟集成能力有限，这限制了它们在动态或交互式场景中的应用。
AI.method: 本文提出了GaINeR（Geometry-Aware Implicit Network Representation）。该方法将可训练的高斯分布与基于神经网络的INR相结合。对于给定的图像坐标，模型检索K个最近的高斯分布，聚合距离加权的嵌入，并通过神经网络预测RGB值。
AI.result: GaINeR的设计实现了连续的图像表示、可解释的几何结构和灵活的局部编辑能力。它为物理感知和交互式图像处理奠定了基础。
AI.conclusion: GaINeR通过引入可训练高斯分布，解决了传统INR在几何结构和局部编辑方面的局限性，为2D图像提供了一种更强大、更具交互性的表示方法，适用于物理感知和动态图像操作。

title: Robust Rule-Based Sizing and Control of Batteries for Peak Shaving Applications
summary: As the cost of batteries lowers, sizing and control methods that are both fast and can achieve their promised performances when deployed are becoming more important. In this paper, we show how stochastically tuned rule based controllers (RBCs) can be effectively used to achieve both these goals, providing more realistic estimates in terms of achievable levelised cost of energy (LCOE), and better performances while in operation when compared to deterministic model predictive control (MPC). We test the proposed methodology on yearly profiles from real meters for peak shaving applications and provide strong evidence about these claims.

AI.tldr: 随着电池成本降低，本文提出随机调优的基于规则的控制器（RBCs）在电池尺寸确定和控制方面优于确定性模型预测控制（MPC），能提供更实际的能源平准化成本（LCOE）估计和更好的运行性能，尤其适用于削峰应用。
AI.motivation: 随着电池成本的降低，快速且能实现预期性能的电池尺寸确定和控制方法变得越来越重要。
AI.method: 本文展示了如何有效使用随机调优的基于规则的控制器（RBCs）来达到目标，并将其与确定性模型预测控制（MPC）进行比较。方法在真实的电表年负荷数据上进行了削峰应用测试。
AI.result: 与确定性MPC相比，随机调优的RBCs能提供更实际的LCOE估计，并在实际运行中表现出更好的性能。
AI.conclusion: 随机调优的RBCs可以有效地用于电池尺寸确定和控制，尤其在削峰应用中，相比确定性MPC，它能提供更准确的性能估计和更优的运行表现。

title: Enhancing Burmese News Classification with Kolmogorov-Arnold Network Head Fine-tuning
comment: 6 pages, 2 figures, 4 tables, Accepted to iSAI-NLP 2025
summary: In low-resource languages like Burmese, classification tasks often fine-tune only the final classification layer, keeping pre-trained encoder weights frozen. While Multi-Layer Perceptrons (MLPs) are commonly used, their fixed non-linearity can limit expressiveness and increase computational cost. This work explores Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (KANs) as alternative classification heads, evaluating Fourier-based FourierKAN, Spline-based EfficientKAN, and Grid-based FasterKAN-across diverse embeddings including TF-IDF, fastText, and multilingual transformers (mBERT, Distil-mBERT). Experimental results show that KAN-based heads are competitive with or superior to MLPs. EfficientKAN with fastText achieved the highest F1-score (0.928), while FasterKAN offered the best trade-off between speed and accuracy. On transformer embeddings, EfficientKAN matched or slightly outperformed MLPs with mBERT (0.917 F1). These findings highlight KANs as expressive, efficient alternatives to MLPs for low-resource language classification.

AI.tldr: 本研究探索了Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (KANs) 作为低资源语言（如缅甸语）分类任务中多层感知器（MLPs）的替代分类头，发现KANs在表达能力和效率上具有竞争力或更优。
AI.motivation: 在低资源语言中，分类任务通常只微调最终分类层，保持预训练编码器权重冻结。常用的MLPs由于其固定的非线性限制了表达能力并增加了计算成本。
AI.method: 研究探索了三种KAN变体（FourierKAN、EfficientKAN、FasterKAN）作为分类头，并在多种嵌入（TF-IDF、fastText、mBERT、Distil-mBERT）上进行了评估，并与传统的MLPs进行了比较。
AI.result: KAN-based 分类头与MLPs相比具有竞争力或更优。EfficientKAN结合fastText达到了最高的F1分数（0.928）。FasterKAN在速度和准确性之间提供了最佳权衡。在Transformer嵌入上，EfficientKAN与mBERT结合时与MLPs持平或略微超越（0.917 F1）。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明KANs是MLPs在低资源语言分类任务中富有表达力且高效的替代方案。

title: MADRA: Multi-Agent Debate for Risk-Aware Embodied Planning
summary: Ensuring the safety of embodied AI agents during task planning is critical for real-world deployment, especially in household environments where dangerous instructions pose significant risks. Existing methods often suffer from either high computational costs due to preference alignment training or over-rejection when using single-agent safety prompts. To address these limitations, we propose MADRA, a training-free Multi-Agent Debate Risk Assessment framework that leverages collective reasoning to enhance safety awareness without sacrificing task performance. MADRA employs multiple LLM-based agents to debate the safety of a given instruction, guided by a critical evaluator that scores responses based on logical soundness, risk identification, evidence quality, and clarity. Through iterative deliberation and consensus voting, MADRA significantly reduces false rejections while maintaining high sensitivity to dangerous tasks. Additionally, we introduce a hierarchical cognitive collaborative planning framework that integrates safety, memory, planning, and self-evolution mechanisms to improve task success rates through continuous learning. We also contribute SafeAware-VH, a benchmark dataset for safety-aware task planning in VirtualHome, containing 800 annotated instructions. Extensive experiments on AI2-THOR and VirtualHome demonstrate that our approach achieves over 90% rejection of unsafe tasks while ensuring that safe-task rejection is low, outperforming existing methods in both safety and execution efficiency. Our work provides a scalable, model-agnostic solution for building trustworthy embodied agents.

AI.tldr: 本文提出MADRA，一个免训练的多智能体辩论风险评估框架，通过LLM智能体集体推理和迭代投票，显著提升具身AI任务规划的安全性，降低误拒率。同时引入分层认知协作规划框架和SafeAware-VH数据集，实验证明其在安全性和执行效率上优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 确保具身AI智能体在任务规划中的安全性至关重要，尤其是在家庭环境中，危险指令会带来重大风险。现有方法存在计算成本高昂（偏好对齐训练）或过度拒绝（单智能体安全提示）的局限性。
AI.method: 本文提出MADRA（Multi-Agent Debate Risk Assessment），一个免训练的多智能体辩论风险评估框架。该框架利用多个基于LLM的智能体对指令安全性进行辩论，并由一个关键评估器根据逻辑合理性、风险识别、证据质量和清晰度对响应进行评分。通过迭代审议和共识投票，MADRA减少了误拒。此外，还引入了一个分层认知协作规划框架，整合了安全、记忆、规划和自我进化机制以提高任务成功率，并贡献了SafeAware-VH基准数据集（包含800条VirtualHome中带注释的指令）。
AI.result: MADRA显著降低了错误拒绝，同时对危险任务保持高敏感性。在AI2-THOR和VirtualHome上的实验表明，该方法实现了90%以上的不安全任务拒绝率，同时确保安全任务的低拒绝率，在安全性和执行效率方面均优于现有方法。分层框架通过持续学习提高了任务成功率。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为构建值得信赖的具身智能体提供了一个可扩展、模型无关的解决方案，显著提升了具身AI在复杂环境中的安全性和可靠性。

title: Bang-Bang Evasion: Its Stochastic Optimality and a Terminal-Set-Based Implementation
summary: We address the problem of optimal evasion in a planar endgame engagement, where a target with bounded lateral acceleration seeks to avoid interception by a missile guided by a linear feedback law. Contrary to existing approaches, that assume perfect information or use heuristic maneuver models in stochastic settings, we formulate the problem in an inherently stochastic framework involving imperfect information and bounded controls. Complying with the generalized separation theorem, the control law factors in the posterior distribution of the state. Extending the well-known optimality of bang-bang evasion maneuvers in deterministic settings to the realm of realistic, stochastic evasion scenarios, we firstly prove that an optimal evasion strategy always exists, and that the set of optimal solutions includes at least one bang-bang policy, rendering the resulting optimal control problem finite-dimensional.
